title.en: Jinja no Mori no Nora Neko-kun

description.en:
This is the worst summer ever.

Summer vacation has begun and Negi is about to have a great summer:
Her parents want to divorce and she'll spent all the vacation on the countryside, at her uncle's shrine. However, she'll meet Satsuki who's also living with her uncle.
He's tough but somehow she can't stop looking at him....

Included Oneshots:
[*] [b][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/28663/maigo-no-obakeyashiki]Maigo no Obakeyashiki  (Haunted House of the Lost)[/b]
A girl is bored of her unchanging peaceful life, and goes to a house that is considered haunted. She meets a boy there instead of ghosts. 

[*] [b]Houkago no Kotaesagashi[/b]

(From: MU)
